body:
So after no thinking whatsoever, I have retired from Social Media only being on the team for about 2-3 months. The main reason being is I felt useless, nothing ever happened and Cord's retirement just made it worse.

Avicus still has a place in my heart. I will probably not play on it as much, maybe try to get jr mod.

(PLEASE DO NOT GO AND HATE ON THE SOCIAL MEDIA TEAM)

peace
